rationale: The agent only modified one of two required locations in DefaultBuiltInExecutorBuilders.java. Ground truth changes both WRITE_COORDINATION (line 48) and SYSTEM_WRITE_COORDINATION (line 213), but the agent's diff only shows changes to WRITE_COORDINATION. Additionally, the agent added `.trackMaxQueueLatency()` which is not present in ground truth, though this is a minor deviation. The formatting difference (multi-line vs single-line) is cosmetic and acceptable. The critical issue is the missing second change to SYSTEM_WRITE_COORDINATION, making the implementation incomplete.
